name: voltaserve
description: Voltaserve is a self-hosted platform for storing, previewing, and searching documents and media with full-text search and permission controls in a modern web UI.
features: Document storage: Store and organize documents and media files in a centralized repository.
File previews: Preview documents, images, and videos directly in the browser without downloading.
Full-text search: Search document contents with full-text indexing for quick information retrieval.
Permission controls: Define granular permissions to control who can view, edit, or share files.
Folder organization: Organize files in hierarchical folders for structured document management.
Version history: Track document versions and revert to previous versions when needed.
Sharing: Share files and folders with other users or generate public links.
Collaboration: Work together on documents with team members using shared workspaces.
Modern interface: Navigate a clean, modern web interface designed for productivity.
File upload: Upload files via drag-and-drop or traditional file selection.
Search filters: Filter search results by file type, date, or other metadata.
API access: Integrate document management into other applications using the REST API.
